actor_awards.notes: Won a Tony Award for Best Featured Actor in a Play for 'Tea and Sympathy' (1954) before reprising the role in the 1956 film.

filmography.title: Tea and Sympathy
filmography.role_description: A sensitive prep school student falsely accused of homosexuality who finds compassion from the headmaster's wife.
filmography.plot: A sensitive teenager at a boarding school is bullied by his classmates and headmaster for his lack of machismo, finding solace only with the headmaster's wife.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – New Star of the Year (Actor)

filmography.title: South Pacific
filmography.role_description: A young Marine lieutenant on a secret mission in WWII who falls in love with a local Tonkinese girl but struggles with his own racial prejudices.
filmography.plot: On an island in the South Pacific during World War II, love blooms between a nurse and a Frenchman, and a Marine lieutenant and a native girl.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Sound (Film won, Kerr starred)

filmography.title: The Pit and the Pendulum
filmography.role_description: An Englishman who travels to a Spanish castle to investigate the mysterious death of his sister.
filmography.plot: In the sixteenth century, Francis Barnard travels to Spain to clarify the circumstances of his sister's death after she married the son of a cruel Inquisitor.

filmography.title: The Cobweb
filmography.role_description: A troubled young patient and artist at a psychiatric clinic who becomes the center of a power struggle among the staff.
filmography.plot: At a psychiatric clinic, the staff and patients are drawn into a conflict over new drapes for the library, masking deeper personal and professional tensions.

filmography.title: Gaby
filmography.role_description: An American paratrooper in WWII London who falls in love with a French ballerina before being sent into action.
filmography.plot: A French ballerina in London falls for an American soldier during World War II, but their romance is complicated by the war.

filmography.title: The Vintage
filmography.role_description: An Italian fugitive hiding out with his brother in a French vineyard.
filmography.plot: Two Italian brothers, one of whom is wanted for murder, cross the border into France and find work and romance at a vineyard.

filmography.title: Girl of the Night
filmography.role_description: A character involved in the life of a call girl undergoing psychoanalysis.
filmography.plot: A call girl tries to leave her profession with the help of a psychoanalyst while dealing with her pimp and a new love interest.

filmography.title: The Crowded Sky
filmography.role_description: A young pilot flying a military jet that is on a collision course with a commercial airliner.
filmography.plot: A commercial airliner and a Navy jet fly toward a fateful mid-air collision while the personal lives of the crew and passengers unfold.

filmography.title: Seven Women from Hell
filmography.role_description: An American pilot who aids a group of female prisoners escaping a Japanese internment camp.
filmography.plot: During WWII, seven women escape a Japanese prison camp in New Guinea and struggle to survive in the jungle.

filmography.title: The Seven Minutes
filmography.role_description: A role in the drama surrounding a censorship trial of a controversial book.
filmography.plot: A bookseller is arrested for selling a banned book, leading to a high-profile trial involving political intrigue and free speech.

filmography.title: Yuma
filmography.role_description: An Army captain involved in corruption at a frontier post.
filmography.plot: A U.S. Marshal is sent to the lawless town of Yuma to restore order and uncovers a conspiracy involving the local military post.

filmography.title: Dealing: Or the Berkeley-to-Boston Forty-Brick Lost-Bag Blues
filmography.role_description: A small role as a stockbroker in this counterculture crime comedy.
filmography.plot: A Harvard law student travels to Berkeley to pick up a shipment of marijuana for a friend, but things go wrong when the bag is lost.

filmography.title: The Amateur
filmography.role_description: A CIA agent involved in the security surrounding a computer expert seeking revenge.
filmography.plot: A CIA cryptographer blackmails his agency into training him to hunt down the terrorists who killed his fiancée.

filmography.title: Plague
filmography.role_description: A security guard at a research facility where a deadly virus is unleashed.
filmography.plot: An accidental spill at a research lab releases a deadly virus, and a security guard becomes a key figure in the containment failure.

filmography.title: Search and Destroy
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in this action film about a former South Vietnamese official seeking revenge.
filmography.plot: A former South Vietnamese official is hunted by an American soldier in Niagara Falls.

filmography.title: Australian Dream
filmography.role_description: A character in this Australian comedy-drama.
filmography.plot: A satirical look at suburban life in Australia through the eyes of various eccentric characters.

filmography.title: Only God Knows
filmography.role_description: A minor role as a health inspector.
filmography.plot: A comedy involving a priest, a rabbi, and a mobster.

filmography.title: The Park Is Mine
filmography.role_description: A reporter covering the siege of Central Park. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: A Vietnam veteran takes control of Central Park in New York City to draw attention to the plight of ignored veterans.

filmography.title: Incident on a Dark Street
filmography.role_description: A lawyer representing a key figure in a corruption investigation. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: A small-time hood is murdered just as he is about to expose a construction kickback scheme, leading federal prosecutors to investigate.

filmography.title: The Longest Night
filmography.role_description: An FBI agent involved in a kidnapping case. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: The daughter of a wealthy family is kidnapped and buried alive in a box with limited air, sparking a frantic race against time.

filmography.title: Peyton Place
filmography.role_description: The town's District Attorney who prosecutes key cases during the series run.
filmography.plot: The scandals, loves, and secrets of a small New England town.

filmography.title: Arrest and Trial
filmography.role_description: An Assistant District Attorney working alongside the lead prosecutor.
filmography.plot: A crime drama that follows both the police investigation (Arrest) and the subsequent legal proceedings (Trial).

filmography.title: The Long, Hot Summer
filmography.role_description: A regular character in the television adaptation of the Faulkner stories.
filmography.plot: The wealthy and powerful Varner family dominates a small Mississippi town.

filmography.title: The Streets of San Francisco
filmography.role_description: A prosecutor who frequently works with the detectives on their cases.
filmography.plot: Two police detectives, a veteran and a rookie, solve crimes in San Francisco.

filmography.title: Washington: Behind Closed Doors
filmography.role_description: A character in this acclaimed miniseries about political power.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized account of the Nixon administration, focusing on the abuse of power and political intrigue.
